content.text: Match ends, Atlético de Madrid 4, Córdoba 2.
Second Half ends, Atlético de Madrid 4, Córdoba 2.
Attempt missed. Fede Cartabia (Córdoba) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the left.
Fede Cartabia (Córdoba) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Guilherme Siqueira (Atlético de Madrid).
Goal!  Atlético de Madrid 4, Córdoba 2. Nabil Ghilas (Córdoba) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Fausto Rossi.
Attempt missed. Mario Mandzukic (Atlético de Madrid) right footed shot from the right side of the box misses to the left following a set piece situation.

Fede Vico (Córdoba) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Goal!  Atlético de Madrid 4, Córdoba 1. Raul García (Atlético de Madrid) header from the left side of the six yard box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Koke with a cross.
Attempt missed. Abel Gómez (Córdoba) right footed shot from long range on the left is just a bit too high. Assisted by Fausto Rossi.
Corner,  Córdoba. Conceded by Diego Godín.

Substitution, Atlético de Madrid. Cristian Rodríguez replaces Antoine Griezmann.
